text: AFK Union Žižkov is a football club in the Czech Republic. It was founded in 1907 in the city of Prague. == Historical names == * AFK Union Žižkov (1907–?) * ASK Union Žižkov (?–1948) * Sokol Union Žižkov (1948–1950) * Sokol Žižkov B (1950–1952) * ZSJ Pošta Žižkov (1952–1953) * TJ Dynamo Žižkov Spoje (1953–?) * TJ Spoje Žižkov * TJ Union Žižkov * AFK Union Žižkov == Other websites == * Official site Union Zizkov Category:1907 establishments in Europe
title: AFK Union Žižkov
